name: Australis Tab defogger
description: Removes the fog from Australis tab backgrounds and uses white text and icons for easier viewing on a transparent/glass windows. defog
additional_info: The CSS sets the fog to 0.2 at the top so you can change this easily by modifying the value if text is too hard to read. 1 sets it to default fog, 0.5 is in between, and 0.1 is barely visible.
